page.title: 04UNEMPLOYMENT IN SANDBACH
page.content: UNEMPLOYMENT IS GROWING IN SANDBACH. FROM THE SURVEY WE CARRIED OUT WE LEARNED SEVERAL THINGS. UNEMPLOYMENT IS MOST COMMON AMONGST THE 16-21 AGE GROUP. SOME HAVE NOT WORKED SINCE THEY LEFT SCHOOL.{JOB PROSPECTS}ARE QUITE POOR FOR WOMEN ALTHOUGH MANY WOMEN CHOSE NOT TO WORK. THERE IS ALSO QUITE A LOT OF UN{EMPLOYMENT}IN THE OVER 50 AGE RANGE WHERE MANY MEN HAVE BEEN MADE REDUNDANT. IN A VISIT TO THE{JOB CENTRE}IN SANDBACH WE SAW SOME JOBS ON OFFER BUT THEY ARE NOT VERY EXCITING.THERE WERE SEVERAL VACANCIES IN PUBS AND CLUBS BUT THEY WERE NOT WELL PAID.IN SOME CASES{TRANSPORT}IS A PROBLEM AND PEOPLE HAVE TO TURN DOWN JOBS AS THEY CAN'T GET TO WORK.MOST PEOPLE AGREED THAT BEING UNEMPLOYED IS VERY BORING.
